lyrics:
Breakout Lyrics[Intro]
And breakout

[Verse 1]
When explanations make no sense
When every answer's wrong
You're fighting with lost confidence
All expectations gone
The time has come to make or break
Move on, don't hesitate
And breakout

[Chorus]
Don't stop to ask
And now you've found a break to make at last
You've got to find a way
Say what you want to say
Breakout
[Verse 2]
When situations never change
Tomorrow looks unsure
Don't leave your destiny to chance
What are you waiting for?
The time has come to make or break
Breakout

[Chorus]
Don't stop to ask
And now you've found a break to make at last
You've got to find a way
Say what you want to say
Breakout
Don't stop to ask
Now you've found a break to make at last
You've got to find a way
Say what you want to say
Breakout

[Bridge]
Some people stop at nothing
If you're searching for something
Lay down the law, shout out for more
Breakout and shout, day in, day out
Breakout
[Breakdown]
Breakout

[Chorus]
Don't stop to ask
And now you've found a break to make at last
You've got to find a way
Say what you want to say
And breakout
Don't stop to ask
And now you've found a break to make at last
You've got to find a way
Say what you want to say
And breakout

[Outro]
Don't stop (Lay down the law, shout out for more)
To ask (Breakout and shout, day i,n day out)
And now you've found a break to make at last (Ooh, breakout)
You've got to find a way (Breakout)
Say what you want to say
Breakout
Don't stop (Lay down the law, shout out for more)
To ask (Breakout and shout, day in, day out)
And now you've found a break to make at last
You've got to find a way...2Embed
